title: Social Media X - URL Buttons
longDescription:
Introducing "Social Media X" - a system that allows users to expedite their work on links to their social media profiles while providing extensive customization options for buttons.


Video Presentation: >>> HERE <<<


"Social Media X" is an innovative tool that enables users to personalize various parameters to create the perfect buttons for their social media presence. Here are some of the features available:


  • Button Shape: "Social Media X" offers different button shapes such as circular, square, or rectangular, allowing users to customize them according to their preferences. 
  • Button Animation: The system allows users to set animations for button appearances, adding a dynamic touch that captures users' attention and enhances the overall user experience.
  • Tooltip Animation: "Social Media X" also offers animations for tooltips, which are small labels that appear when users hover over the buttons. This additional feature enriches interactions and provides a better user experience.
  • Text Customization: Users can customize the text displayed on the buttons. System automatically add the first letter from the button's name to its icon.
  • URL Setting: Each button can be assigned a unique URL, allowing users to easily redirect visitors to their respective social media profiles.
  • Button Position and Spacing: "Social Media X" provides full control over button placement and spacing on the canvas panel, ensuring precise layout adjustments and intuitive navigation.
  • Rounded Corner Customization: Users can adjust the level of roundedness for button corners, enabling them to achieve a softer or more angular appearance based on their design preferences.
  • Sharpness Setting: "Social Media X" allows users to adjust the sharpness of the displayed buttons, offering the option to create either crisp or more blurred visual effects.
  • Animation Speed: "Social Media X" provides the ability to control the speed of button animations, allowing users to fine-tune the timing to match the overall dynamics.
  • Button Alert: This feature enables users to include an alert with the button, which disappears when the cursor hovers over it. This interactive element adds interest and provides users with subtle notification.
